title: Controversy at end of Spanish American War - cause

content.prompt: Which of the following aroused the greatest controversy in the United States at the end of the Spanish-American War?

choices.label: Payment of a $20 million indemnity to Spain
Humanitarian efforts on behalf of concentration camp victims
Increases in the size of the army and navy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
